HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava na sve narudžbe iznad 70 €. U cijene proizvoda nisu uključeni troškovi dostave iz razloga se isti posebno plaćaju.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Isporuka će uslijediti najkasnije u roku 10 radnih dana od vidljive uplate na računu Prodavatelja.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Popis otoka na koje dostavlja dostavna služba možete pronaći na linku.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only available shipping method. No options for parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by Overseas Express and DPD.
PRICING: Shipping is free for all orders over 70 €. For orders below this amount, the shipping cost is calculated during the checkout process. Cash on delivery (pouzećem) is offered as a payment method, but no specific surcharge is mentioned.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: The standard delivery timeframe is up to 10 working days. Delivery to islands is possible, with a list of serviceable islands available via a link provided by the courier, suggesting potential restrictions. There is no information on express or weekend delivery services.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The key feature is free delivery over a 70 € threshold. Cash on delivery is available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not on a dedicated page but is located within the general 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase). While it provides basic information on providers and a free shipping threshold, it lacks clarity on standard shipping costs, which are only revealed at checkout. Information on other common delivery methods like parcel points or express shipping is absent.
